TV TEACHER; (SYNC) (CONTINUED)
On this counter we find special
equipment which the scientists use
in their experiments****and speci¬
mens from the underwater world*
TV TEACHER; (OS) This is the
skeleton of a starfish* *<>one of
the interesting animals which
nature has designed to live in
the ocean*
TV TEACHER: (SYNC) He has a spiny
outside skeleton and long arms
which can be used for moving
around and catching his food*
TVJTEACHER; (OS) This "star of
the sea" is not just a pretty
ornament**obut a hunter***
TV TEACHER; (SYNC) Who can clamp
onto a shellfish***like this
scallop**oand hang on**.until
the shellfish opens its shell***
or until the starfish can pry the
shell apart*
TV TEACHER; (SYNC) How does the
starfish hang on? With these
powerful suction cups which line
his arms*
